Overview: Developed an interactive web application designed to present a company's digital services and solutions in a visually engaging way. The application offers a seamless user experience with custom navigation and interactive elements, showcasing various business challenges and their corresponding solutions.

Developed an interactive web application designed to present a company's digital services and solutions in a visually engaging way. The application offers a seamless user experience with custom navigation and interactive elements, showcasing various business challenges and their corresponding solutions.
Features: Custom navigation with smooth transitions and intuitive UI.
Interactive elements such as animations, hover effects, and dynamic content.
Solution showcase sections that clearly present business challenges and solutions.

Overview: Developed a comprehensive web application for an eyewear retail business, focusing on showcasing and managing sunglasses products.
The application includes features for browsing products, viewing detailed product information, and managing a shopping cart.
Integrated Stripe for secure and efficient payment processing, allowing users to complete their purchases smoothly.
Utilized an external API to check and utilize user location for enhanced functionality, such as showing store locations or local promotions.
Implemented user authentication to allow customers to create accounts, log in, and track their orders.
Incorporated responsive design principles to ensure a seamless user experience across various devices.
Utilized a modern tech stack to deliver a smooth and efficient shopping experience, including real-time updates and interactive elements.
Features: Product catalog with detailed information and high-quality images.
Shopping cart functionality with real-time updates and checkout process.
Secure payment processing integrated with Stripe.
External API integration for checking user location and providing localized services.
User authentication system for account management and order tracking.
Responsive design ensuring compatibility across desktops, tablets, and smartphones.
Interactive elements to enhance user engagement and product discovery.

Overview: Developed a backend system for user management and authentication, utilizing modern technologies to provide secure and efficient functionalities.
The system includes user signup, email verification, and secure login mechanisms using JSON Web Tokens (JWT).
Integrated file upload capabilities with Multer and dynamic view rendering with EJS.
Implemented email notifications using Nodemailer for transactional purposes.
Utilized SWA (Static Web Apps) for seamless file deployment and hosting.
The application supports user profile management and secure session handling.
Features: User signup with email verification and secure authentication.
JWT-based authentication for secure and stateless user sessions.
File upload functionality with Multer for handling user-generated content.
Dynamic view rendering using EJS for personalized user experiences.
Transactional email notifications via Nodemailer for actions like signup and verification.
Efficient file deployment and hosting using SWA.

Overview: Developed a versatile Todo application to help users manage their tasks effectively.
The application includes functionalities for adding, editing, and deleting tasks, as well as marking them as completed.
Incorporated user authentication to allow users to create accounts and save their tasks securely.
Implemented real-time updates to ensure that task changes are reflected immediately across the user interface.
Optimized for responsiveness to ensure a seamless experience across various devices.
Features: Task management with options to add, edit, delete, and mark tasks as completed.
User authentication system for account creation and task management.
Real-time updates to reflect changes in tasks instantly.
Responsive design for a consistent experience across different screen sizes.
Clean and intuitive user interface for easy task management.
